job_tasks.phrase: Redesign and optimize our Kafka streaming components to reduce latency, increase throughput, and increase event consumption rate.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes traditional software engineering tasks focused on improving the performance and efficiency of existing data processing components, which aligns with building and maintaining software applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Upgrading/Developing new components of a multilayered application to enable near real-time data processing.
job_tasks.justification: This involves the core software development activity of creating and enhancing application components to support specific functionalities, fitting the definition of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Monitor, maintain and debug all components daily to ensure stability and consistency.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the operational aspects of software engineering, focusing on ensuring the ongoing stability, consistency, and reliability of system components in production.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses exclusively on software engineering tasks related to data processing infrastructure (Kafka streaming components, real-time data processing) and operations (monitoring, maintenance, debugging). There are no mentions of AI/ML model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, RAG, or any AI-specific specialization. Therefore, the role is classified as a 'Software Engineer' as it involves building and maintaining software systems without direct AI/ML integration.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and specific about the tasks involved, which are all related to data engineering and software operations. There is no ambiguity regarding AI/ML responsibilities, making the classification straightforward.
